title: kaNDEn tiruccembUril
sahitya:
kaNDEn tiruccembUril kuDikoNDa vaDivElanai


anupallavi

  aNDivarum aDiyAraiATkoNDu aruLvOnai deNDaniTTup-paNIvOrai tAngit-tuNai taruvOnE


caraNam    aNNan gaNapatiyODu ambAL bhagavatiyum veNNai virumbum maivaNNak-kaNNanum
toNDar sharaNamenru tozhuginra ayyappanum aNNal murugan arugE amarnda tiru kATSiyai
